name: Falling Danger Endless
description:
Avoid the danger symbolized in red and survive to death. Legend has it that someone managed to touch the ground from an abyss without limits.

This game was made in the process of fulfilling lecture assignments. The possibility of this game will continue until it has several other features such as shop, characters, etc.

Donations, criticisms and suggestions really helped us in developing this game.

Thank you for playing
